channel.title: Peter Breedveld - Advalvas on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Peter Breedveld - Advalvas on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Roddelen is hartstikke nuttig voor je netwerk
item.description: Interview with journalist Peter Breedveld and dr. Elena Martinescu about our work on on factors shaping adherence to norms about the Coronavirus in the Netherlands and my work on gossip about Coronavirus published in the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam’s independent magazine ‘Advalvas’.
